name: NotebookLM Integration Overview
description: NotebookLM skill uses Playwright for browser automation to interact with Google NotebookLM. Requires authentication via Google login. Stores session state in data/browser_state/. Supports notebook library management with metadata (topics, descriptions, tags). Implements response caching and query history tracking.

name: biome-config
description: Biome configuration with Prettier-compatible settings: 2-space indent, single quotes, 100 char width. Ignores dist/, coverage/, .beads/, .sisyphus/
